name: d3-timestrip
description: A simple time strip plugin for d3.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-timestrip.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-timestrip.js -c -m -o build/d3-timestrip.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-timestrip.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-timestrip.js build/d3-timestrip.min.js
